### Request for Proposal

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites bids from qualified contractors for the provision of welding services to support the installation and modification of welded pressure piping, pressure tubing, and the repair and alteration of pressure vessels. The scope of work includes general welding services performed at the contractor's shop and on-site at NRCan's Bells Corners Complex in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Trade Agreements**
The proposed contract will be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Tender Status**

### Proposal Requirements

* The selected contractor will be required to provide a comprehensive plan for the execution of the project, including installation and modification of welded pressure piping, pressure tubing, and the repair and alteration of pressure vessels.
* The contractor will be responsible for ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and standards.
* The contractor must have a minimum of three (3) years of experience in performing similar work.
